CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1951, pg. 24, reads: " Katherine Kuhlman Prayer Band Plays Santa Claus To Needy Families - Members of the interracial Katherine Kuhlman Prayer Band, numbering over 100 persons, played Santa Claus to needy families this week. The following workers took part in distributing and preparing the baskets: Mrs. Ann Lucas, Miss Mabel Hackett, Mrs. Leona Paul, Mrs. Thelma Litzinger, Mrs. Annie Edwards, Mrs. E. Tally, Mrs. Pearl Black, Mrs. Ann Bell, Miss Esther Lindberg, Mrs. Murphy, Mrs. Alice Kaufman, Mrs. Mary Pillar, Brue Biser, William Taylor, Charles Loech, A. Bernard, Albert A. Lucas, and David Cohler."
TitMainTitle: Two women and man, members of the Katherine Kuhlman Prayer Band, standing in basement interior preparing food baskets
